That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
